name: Greedy Guts
description:
You've been swallowed by greedy guts. Now you have to escape using your own means of transport, a spaceship, but beware; he never stops eating. Fly your way out, avoiding falling junk food and collect blue crystals along the way for the highest score! Don't go too slow though or you will be swallowed by some greenish acid.

Created for the Ludum Dare 42 (August 2018).

Programming : Janko Knez

Art & Design : Veronika Burger

Music & sound effects : Domen Antlej
